original_text: And hath taken of the king's seed, and made a covenant with him, and hath taken an oath of him: he hath also taken the mighty of the land:
korean_text: 그 왕족 중에서 하나를 택하여 언약을 세우고 그에게 맹세하게 하고 또 그 땅의 능한 자들을 옮겨 갔나니

sentences.original_text: And hath taken of the king's seed
and made a covenant with him
and hath taken an oath of him:
he hath also taken the mighty of the land:
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그 땅의 강력한 자들을 취하였다
